entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
